video.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures
video.synopsis: Teenage Pac and his loyal crew face the ups and downs of adolescence while protecting Pac-World from a ghostly army led by the evil Betrayus.

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to the school bully, Pac-Man accidentally opens the portal to the Netherworld, unleashing an army of ghosts led by the fiery Lord Betrayus.
episodes.title: The Adventure Begins: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: PacWorld is under siege by ghosts and there is little Pac-Man can do about it without fresh berries from the Tree of Life.
episodes.title: The Adventure Begins: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Pac and friends keep defeating all his ghosts, Betrayus -- with the help of Dr. Buttocks -- decides to clone an army of Netherworld monsters.
episodes.title: No Pets Allowed….Especially Monsters!: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Buttocks amps up the stakes by inventing the Molecular Magnifier to create gigantic monsters.
episodes.title: No Pets Allowed….Especially Monsters!: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Lord Betrayus plans to render Pac powerless by getting Inky, Blinky, Pinky and Clyde to feed Pac so he'll be too full to eat anything else.
episodes.title: All You Can Eat

episodes.synopsis: Pac and his pals grow suspicious when President Spheros starts behaving strangely, and eventually realize Spheros has been possessed.
episodes.title: President Possessed!

episodes.synopsis: Pac gets a huge zit right before class picture day. As he gets more stressed about it, more zits appear.
episodes.title: Is Zit You or is Zit Me?

episodes.synopsis: When Pac and his pals get blasted into the past, he finally meets his parents.
episodes.title: Pac to the Future

episodes.synopsis: PacWorld kingpin Obtuse is working for Betrayus and uses Skeebo to try and steal Pac's power berries, but the plan backfires.
episodes.title: Heebo Skeebo

episodes.synopsis: Pac-Man is physically controlled by Betrayus when he swallows a special microchip.
episodes.title: Mission ImPacable!

episodes.synopsis: Lord Betrayus steals the repository of the ghosts' corporeal bodies, but not before Inky, Blinky, Pinky and Clyde nab one body to share between them.
episodes.title: No Body Knows

episodes.synopsis: Accompanying Pac and friends on a mission, Sir Cumference tries to show that he is more than just an old scientist.
episodes.title: Seems Like Old Times

episodes.synopsis: PacWorld is becoming dangerously hot and its citizens mistakenly blame Sir C.
episodes.title: Betrayus Turns the Heat Up

episodes.synopsis: The annual Pacolympics approach and allow for Aunt Spheria to reignite a Pac-Pong rivalry with Lord Betrayus.
episodes.title: Pac-Pong Fever

episodes.synopsis: An ancient artifact once belonging to Pac's parents leads to a temple within a maze that may hold the secret to the Tree of Life.
episodes.title: Indiana Pac and the Temple of Slime

episodes.synopsis: Pac fails his driver's license test because of a ridiculously strict, hovering vehicles department employee, Mr. Strickler.
episodes.title: Driver's Pac

episodes.synopsis: Betrayus's fortunes are changing when he summons a Nether-Witch to curse Pac-Man with bad luck.
episodes.title: Jinxed

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Buttocks lures a giant Ghosteroid to threaten PacWorld, and Pac-Man must grow to planet proportions to save the day.
episodes.title: Planet Pac Verses the Ghosteroid

episodes.synopsis: It’s ValenPac Day and Pinky is so jealous of Pac's friendship with Cyli, she tries to get rid of her rival.
episodes.title: Stand By Your Pac-Man

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Buttocks gets a map leading to PacLantis, Pac, Cyli and Spiral voyage to the bottom of the sea.
episodes.title: PacLantis

episodes.synopsis: Once every 100 Halloweens, the two moons of PacWorld turn blue, so Betrayus summons Count Pacula to drain the last Yellow Orb in PacWorld.
episodes.title: A Berry Scary Night

episodes.synopsis: The diabolical Dr. Buttocks clones an army of radio-controlled, prehistoric Pacasaurs to attack Pacworld.
episodes.title: Jurassic Pac

episodes.synopsis: Betrayus possesses his mother’s body while Dr. Buttocks hypnotizes the president.
episodes.title: The Great Chase!

episodes.synopsis: When a super gigantic Robot invades Pacopolis, wielding a weapon that renders the power berries powerless, Pac-Man faces the ultimate challenge.
episodes.title: Robo Woes

episodes.synopsis: There's a new threat to PacWorld: a debonair spy ghost named Specter, and Pac gets help from an unexpected source to stop him.
episodes.title: The Spy Who Slimed Me

episodes.synopsis: Apex, the pointy-headed alien, strikes a deal with the Netherworld to join forces and take over PacWorld.
episodes.title: Invasion of the Pointy Heads

episodes.synopsis: At a carnival, Dr. Buttocks tries to steal a golden key that Pac is guarding for Spheros, while the ghost gang sneak in to make their own mischief.
episodes.title: Ride the Wild Pac-topus

episodes.synopsis: After Pac-Man finds a wish-granting genie in a bottle and wishes that all the ghosts would leave the Netherworld, chaos erupts in Pac-World.
episodes.title: Meanie Genie

episodes.synopsis: While trying to prevent Dr. Buttocks from using his Dragon Furnace to make Mt. Pac-Kinley erupt, Pac-Man unearths a prehistoric Cave Pac-Kid.
episodes.title: Cave Pac-Man

episodes.synopsis: Powerful aliens settle a Pac-World dispute by pitting three teams -- Pac and Spiral, Buttocks and Betrayus, and Apex and Tip -- against one another.
episodes.title: Cosmic Contest

episodes.synopsis: While Sir Cumference is on vacation, Buttocks attacks the city with a giant robot, but Pac-Man eats a Brainy Berry and a giant robot battle ensues.
episodes.title: That Smarts!

episodes.synopsis: Pac's celebrity status takes a hit when a TV show about his life makes him look foolish, and Betrayus plots to use the piece for his own evil ends.
episodes.title: Pac-Mania

episodes.synopsis: While searching for his parents, Pac-Man is transported to a future Pac-World, where Betrayus rules and has bewitched all but a few of its citizens.
episodes.title: Rip Van Packle

episodes.synopsis: Pac has his hands full when Buttocks's ghost-nabbing invention causes its users to fall asleep, enabling Betrayus to invade the unguarded city.
episodes.title: Spooka-Bazooka!

episodes.synopsis: Blinky instructs Pac-Man in a new fighting technique after ultimate ninja ghost Master Goo starts to train Betrayus's fearsome army.
episodes.title: The Pac Be With You

episodes.synopsis: President Spheros plans a spectacularly spooky Halloween party for Pac-World, but a series of Were-Pac attacks threaten to derail the fun event.
episodes.title: Cap'n Banshee and his Interstellar Buccaneers

episodes.synopsis: After Buttocks creates an impenetrable ghost army using his invention Buttanium, Pac enlists Sir Cumference's help to defeat the evil genius.
episodes.title: A Hard Dazed Knight

episodes.synopsis: Pac-Man's relaxing summer sky cruise vacation comes to an abrupt halt when he and his friends are confronted by spooky space ghost pirates.
episodes.title: The Shadow of the Were-Pac

episodes.synopsis: When Pac's parents surprise him with a top-secret visit during the holidays, Pac must hide them from his pals, who grow increasingly suspicious.
episodes.title: Happy Holidays and a Merry Berry Day

episodes.synopsis: Betrayus takes advantage of Obtuse to rig Pac-World's presidential election; meanwhile, Cylindria and Skeebo launch campaigns for class president.
episodes.title: Peace Without Slime

episodes.synopsis: As Obtuse is sworn in as president, Pac-Man and former President Spheros smuggle the Tree of Life out of the Round House and inspire an angry mob.
episodes.title: The Ghost Behind the Throne

episodes.synopsis: Disguised as a foreign exchange student, Butt-ler is sent to spy on Pac-Man, but switches sides when Pac-Man and his friends are kind to him.
episodes.title: Nerd is the Word

episodes.synopsis: It's spring in Pacopolis, but Grinder has nobody to love. When he builds a female version of himself named Grindette, Dr. Buttocks kidnaps her.
episodes.title: Bride of Grinder

episodes.synopsis: While camping in Creepy Hollow, Skeebo tells scary stories about the mythical creature Hugefoot. Later, Buttocks builds a robot version of the beast.
episodes.title: The Legend of Creepy Hollow

episodes.synopsis: Pac-Peep kidnaps all of the Netherworld's ghosts, and Betrayus is forced to ask Pac-Man for help recovering them from Easter Egg Island.
episodes.title: Easter Egg Island

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Buttocks zaps Pac-Man and Fuzbitz through a space worm into another dimension, and the pair must hurry to save the rest of PacWorld from oblivion.
episodes.title: Wizard of Odd

episodes.synopsis: When an evil mummy's cursed dentures are stolen, Pac and pals must find them before Buttocks and Betrayus use the terrible teeth to destroy PacWorld.
episodes.title: Indiana Pac and the Dentures of Doom

episodes.synopsis: With the help of Sir C, Pacman heads into cyberspace to stop Buttocks's deadly ghost virus from destroying all of PacWorld's electrical devices.
episodes.title: Honey, I Digitized the Pac-Man

episodes.synopsis: As Pac and pals get ready to celebrate Merry Berry Day, Betrayus plots to kidnap Santa Pac and his Round Deer, plus steal all gifts and decorations.
episodes.title: Santa Pac

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Pacenstein and sidekick Eeghost swap bodies with Pac-Man, Spiral and Cyli try to scare up help from the doctor's neighbor, Count Pacula.
episodes.title: Pac's Scary Halloween: Part I

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Pacenstein and Eeghost plot to ruin Pac's Halloween dinner plans at Transylpacia Castle, and it's up to a scary neighbor to save the day.
episodes.title: Pac's Scary Halloween: Part II

episodes.synopsis: When President Spheros's niece comes to town, Pac-Man and friends are put on security detail to protect the new girl from her father, Betrayus.
episodes.title: New Girl in Town
